Keyless Auto Vehicle Anti-Theft Facial Recognition System

Computer Engineering capstone 2020-2021

Vehicle Anti-Theft Facial Recognition System is designed to prevent burglary using facial recognition system. Hardware uses Raspberry Pi 4 and software uses the Python. The user interface of software is based on android studio. The administrators can choose their option for adding a new driver, delete the current driver, and update the face data of the current driver. The camera is going to be connected to a Raspberry Pi 4 board which is used for taking the picture of a user's face. Then the Raspberry Pi will use OpenCV library to recognize the user's face.

Created by: Alexandre Pereira, Qian Ma, Leyao Li, Feier Zhang, Batuhan Başoğlu and Sam Hermas Parada
